sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile.component.css'] }) export class ProfileComponent { fullName = localStorage.getItem('fullName'); email = localStorage.getItem('email'); }

User Profile

Name: {{ fullName }}

Email: {{ email }}

{{ user?.role }}
